newsitem.title: USA: US exporters report 138,500 tonnes corn to unknown.
newsitem.headline: US exporters report 138,500 tonnes corn to unknown.

text.p: U.S. Agriculture Department said Thursday private exporters reported sales of 138,500 tonnes of corn to unknown destinations for delivery during the 1996/97 marketing year.
The marketing year for corn Sept 1.
USDA issues daily and weekly export sales reports.
Exporters must report to USDA sales of 100,000 tonnes or more of one commodity made in one day to a single destination by 1500 ET the next business day after the sale.
Sales of lesser quantities must be reported weekly.
